name: ExpressGratitude
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Expressing gratitude can be a powerful way to transform your mindset and improve your own life. But sometimes expressing gratitude is hard, and it can feel awkward when you try to tell people you're grateful for them.

This skill will give you a new Gratitude Goal each day in your Flash Briefing to help you get in the habit of expressing gratitude. These goals go beyond simply thinking grateful thoughts, and they will challenge you to actually express gratitude to the people in your life.

By expressing gratitude in person (or on the phone, through text, or even email) you magnify the positive effects on your own mindset while also improving your relationships and giving that positivity back to the people you care about.

In each briefing you will also get tips and advice on how to meet your Gratitude Goal. These tips will include how to make expressing gratitude feel more natural and less awkward, how to get in the habit of expressing gratitude without even thinking about it, and even simply getting better at figuring out what you're grateful for.

WE LOVE GRATITUDE TOO
Express Gratitude is part of Next Level Living's mission to help everyone live happier and more meaningful lives. We're actively supporting this skill and would love to hear from you. Please email kevin@nxtll.com with any feedback or feature requests, and, if you're enjoying this skill, please do leave us a review.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
